schema.name: Ground Beef with Cheese

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Cherry Tomatoes under cold water and cut them in halves.
Cut the Cauliflower into small florets.
In a large skillet, melt the Butter over medium heat.
Add the Ground Beef to the skillet and cook until browned, about 10 minutes.
Add the cut Cauliflower to the skillet, cover, and cook until tender, about 10 minutes.
Stir in the Cherry Tomatoes, Creme Cheese Spread, Salt, Black Pepper, and Lemon Juice. Cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Gradually mix in the Milk to achieve a creamy texture.
Transfer the mixture into a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes or until the top is golden brown.

schema.description: Indulge in a high-protein, low-carb delight with our Ground Beef with Cheese recipe. This healthy reinterpretation of classic comfort food is perfect for those pursuing a nutritious lifestyle without sacrificing flavor. Dive into the richness of ground beef, complemented by the creamy texture of cheese and the freshness of cherry tomatoes and lemon juice. A delight for anyone looking to enjoy Healthy Recipes while keeping their meals delicious and satisfying.
